mapper.insert: insert into STORE_REPORT (SREP_NO, CUS_NO, STORE_NO, STORE_NAME, SREP_TITLE, SREP_FILE, SREP_CONTENT, SREP_DATE, SREP_PROCESS) values(ifnull((select cast(max(SREP_NO) as unsigned)+1 as 'MAXNO' from STORE_REPORT as a), 1), #{cus_no}, #{store_no}, #{store_name}, #{srep_subject}, #{srep_file}, #{srep_content}, date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), '0');
